title: Crash when attempting to use the PHAR
body:
This is what happens when I try to use `psalm` on my machine with php 7.3.5:

```
phive update psalm       
Phive 0.12.1 - Copyright (C) 2015-2020 by Arne Blankerts, Sebastian Heuer and Contributors
Fetching repository list
Downloading https://api.github.com/repos/vimeo/psalm/releases
Downloading https://github.com/vimeo/psalm/releases/download/3.11.2/psalm.phar
Downloading https://github.com/vimeo/psalm/releases/download/3.11.2/psalm.phar.asc
Linking /home/greg/.phive/phars/psalm.phar to /home/greg/bin/psalm
psalm
PHP Fatal error:  Declaration of _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\Internal\Provider\ReturnTypeProvider\ArrayChunkReturnTypeProvider::getFunctionReturnType(_HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\StatementsSource $statements_source, string $function_id, array $call_args, _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\Context $context, _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\CodeLocation $code_location) must be compatible with Psalm\Plugin\Hook\FunctionReturnTypeProviderInterface::getFunctionReturnType(Psalm\StatementsSource $statements_source, string $function_id, array $call_args, Psalm\Context $context, Psalm\CodeLocation $code_location) in phar:///home/greg/.phive/phars/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ReturnTypeProvider/ArrayChunkReturnTypeProvider.php on line 12

Fatal error: Declaration of _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\Internal\Provider\ReturnTypeProvider\ArrayChunkReturnTypeProvider::getFunctionReturnType(_HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\StatementsSource $statements_source, string $function_id, array $call_args, _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\Context $context, _HumbugBox35d4ddeb02f6\Psalm\CodeLocation $code_location) must be compatible with Psalm\Plugin\Hook\FunctionReturnTypeProviderInterface::getFunctionReturnType(Psalm\StatementsSource $statements_source, string $function_id, array $call_args, Psalm\Context $context, Psalm\CodeLocation $code_location) in phar:///home/greg/.phive/phars/psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ReturnTypeProvider/ArrayChunkReturnTypeProvider.php on line 12
```
